translate.login_enter_both: You must enter both your username and password.
translate.login_required: You must be logged in to access this area.
translate.login_un_pw_failed: The username or password you have provided does not match our records.
translate.login_un_failed: The username you provided does not exist in our database.
translate.login_pw_failed: The password you provided is incorrect.
translate.login_locked: You have exceeded the allowed login attempts, your account has been temporarily locked.
translate.login_success: You have been successfully logged in.
translate.login_renewed: Your session has been renewed and will remain active.
translate.login_sess_timout: Your session is set to expire in 60 seconds.
translate.login_log_success: Last successful login was on %date% from %ip%
translate.logout_notify: Your session has expired, and you have been logged out.
translate.alert_refresh_click: If this page does not automaticaly refresh within a few seconds, please click below to continue.
translate.alert_delete: Are you sure you wish to delete this record?
translate.alert_delete_ids: The %%module_name%% record(s) you specified have been deleted.
translate.module_non_existant: The required %%module_name%% module does not exist.
translate.module_non_auth: Your account is not authorized for the %%module_name%% module.
translate.method_non_existant: The required %%module_name%% method does not exist.
translate.method_invalid: %%module_name%% method is not a valid method.
translate.validate_min_length: The minimum length of this field is %%min_length%% characters.
translate.validate_max_length: The maximum length of this field is %%max_length%% characters.
translate.validate_email: The email address you have provided is invalid.
translate.validate_date: The date you have provided is invalid.
translate.validate_address: The address you have provided is invalid.
translate.validate_zip: The zip code you have provided is invalid.
translate.validate_phone: The phone number you have provided is invalid. eg: 123-456-7890
translate.validate_fax: The fax number you have provided is invalid. eg: 123-456-7890
translate.validate_cc: The credit card number you have provided is invalid.
translate.validate_check: The check account number you have provided is invalid.
translate.validate_numeric: This field can contain only numeric characters.
translate.validate_float: This field can contain only numbers with up to one decimal.
translate.validate_alphanumeric: This field can contain only alphanumeric characters
translate.validate_non_numeric: This field cannot contain numeric characters.
translate.validate_any: This field is required and cannot be left blank.
translate.validate_unique: The value you have entered is already in use, please try again.
translate.validate_banned_ip: Sorry, we are presently not accepting new registrations from your area
translate.validate_banned_email: Sorry, we cannot accept new registrations from the e-mail address you provided
translate.validate_ip: Sorry, the domain you specified is invalid and cannot be licensed.
translate.validate_domain: Sorry, the IP address you specified is invalid and cannot be licensed.
translate.validate_general: Sorry, the value you entered is not valid.
translate.validate_password: Must include both numbers and letters, cannot be your initials, and cannot include your first or last name, your username, or your email.
translate.search_save_nickname: Enter a nickname for this search:
translate.search_no_results: No results for your search were found.
translate.search_results: Your search has been completed sucessfully.
translate.search_export_image: Export these search results to XML, PDF, Excel, Comma or Tab Separated Values.
translate.search_print_image: View a printer friendly page with these search results.
translate.search_save_image: Save this search for later retrieval.
